table_description: Represents an Azure AD user account.

columns.name: display_name
columns.description: The name displayed in the address book for the user. This is usually the combination of the user's first name, middle initial and last name.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the user. Should be treated as an opaque identifier.

columns.name: user_principal_name
columns.description: Principal email of the active directory user.

columns.name: account_enabled
columns.description: True if the account is enabled; otherwise, false.

columns.name: created_date_time
columns.description: The time at which the user was created.

columns.name: last_sign_in_date_time
columns.description: The time at which the user was last signed in.

columns.name: user_type
columns.description: A string value that can be used to classify user types in your directory.

columns.name: mail
columns.description: The SMTP address for the user, for example, jeff@contoso.onmicrosoft.com.

columns.name: password_policies
columns.description: Specifies password policies for the user. This value is an enumeration with one possible value being DisableStrongPassword, which allows weaker passwords than the default policy to be specified. DisablePasswordExpiration can also be specified. The two may be specified together; for example: DisablePasswordExpiration, DisableStrongPassword.

columns.name: sign_in_sessions_valid_from_date_time
columns.description: Any refresh tokens or sessions tokens (session cookies) issued before this time are invalid, and applications will get an error when using an invalid refresh or sessions token to acquire a delegated access token (to access APIs such as Microsoft Graph).

columns.name: usage_location
columns.description: A two letter country code (ISO standard 3166), required for users that will be assigned licenses due to legal requirement to check for availability of services in countries.

columns.name: im_addresses
columns.description: The instant message voice over IP (VOIP) session initiation protocol (SIP) addresses for the user.

columns.name: other_mails
columns.description: A list of additional email addresses for the user.

columns.name: og_account_id
columns.description: The Platform Account ID in which the resource is located.

columns.name: og_resource_id
columns.description: The unique ID of the resource in opengovernance.
